name: Loopy Island
description:
Explore beautiful island  in this top of the notch point&click adventure game.

Plot:
Volcano started to erupt, you need to contact someone to help you, but you only have 150 seconds else you will loop endlessly on this Loopy Island

Controls:
- Click on ground to walk
- Click on interactable to interact
- Double click to skip walking
